comments:
When a cycle was found during shutdown, a class cast exception like the
following occurs.

!ENTRY System Bundle 0 0 May 20, 2004 12:19:40.668
!MESSAGE FrameworkEvent.ERROR
!STACK 0
java.lang.ClassCastException
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.BundleStopper.logCycles(BundleStopper.java:35)
	at
org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.BundleStopper.stopBundles(BundleStopper.java:51)
	at
org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseAdaptor.frameworkStopping(EclipseAdaptor.java:486)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.Framework.shutdown(Framework.java:450)
	at
org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.SystemBundle$1.run(SystemBundle.java:181)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:534)

Fixed. Was casting to Bundle instead of to BundleDescription. Took the
opportunity to fix a wrong message key being used.
